alert.note: Alert for Central Marion; Coastal Duval; Coastal Flagler; Coastal St. Johns; Eastern Clay; Eastern Marion; Eastern Putnam; Inland Flagler; Inland St. Johns; South Central Duval; Western Clay; Western Duval; Western Putnam (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 16 at 12:50AM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...Gusty showers will impact portions of northwestern Flagler, St. Johns, northeastern Marion, Putnam, central Clay and southeastern Duval Counties through 130 AM EDT... At 1248 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong gust front and associated showers along a line extending from near Normandy to near George`s Lake to near Fort McCoy. Movement was east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds around 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Saint Augustine, Palatka, Orange Park, Green Cove Springs, Crescent City, Interlachen, Pomona Park, Hastings, East Palatka and Salt Springs. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Considering moving indoors or securing loose items.
